Write it in.

If you want the editorial to draw attention to a subject, you want to tell me something, send a press release if you have any questions, send us a message right off the website. Messages from the COMMITMENT site are read in writing.If you want us to call you back or write, tell me how you can get in touch.♪ Keep in mind that the messages that come from this page are not published.

11 residents The Volgograd region has been infected with brucellosis.

Health16.02.2024 08:09
Comments0
16.02.2024 08:09

In 2023, in the Volgograd region, 11 cases of brucellosis were recorded in the four districts of Ilovlin, Bjkovski, Pallasovsky and Mid-Akhtubin. This data has been published by the Regional Office of the RPN, reports V102.RU. In 2022, 10 people were infected. Brucellosis is a severe infectious and allergic disease that is transmitted from patients, mainly agricultural. ...
